verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What food luxurious loads the board When, at His table, sits the Lord! The wine how rich, the bread how sweet, When Jesus deigns the guests to meet!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou glorious Bridegroom of our hearts, Thy present smile Thy grace imparts! Oh, lift the veil, if veil there be, Let every saint Thy glory see!{/lang-eng}
